Reviews.Title: Believe it or not
Reviews.Author: Narvinder Singh
Reviews.Content: It seems wiered but truth the purchased worked.First impression seems like scam selling $30 T-mobile card in $26. But when i saw it worked actually within couple of minutes after purchase. I couldn't believe it.Highly recommended and mark their words. I liked their service and would surely do the refill again.

Reviews.Title: quick service
Reviews.Author: YING MA
Reviews.Content: Got $30 credit in a few minutes and my new monthly charge went through just now. It worked as expected. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Can't be emailed
Reviews.Author: 11doctor
Reviews.Content: In the questions it said that the pin could be emailed. This is not true. Luckily I got a refund. Why would I want to wait for the mail when I can go to the store or buy elsewhere and get instantly. Makes no sense for they charge almost 9 dollars more and you can't get instantly.

Reviews.Title: Arrived on time, Worked perfectly
Reviews.Author: Mar Chuan "MC"
Reviews.Content: Cheap, arrived on time, worked perfectly.Drawback:The Tmobile prepaid account DOES NOT show you the calls you've made or the text messages you sent.  Therfore you never know if they are accurately deducting your minutes.  I ran a test on my mother's phone (she has the prepaid account too) and noticed they kept deducting a ton of minutes even though she only made a few one minute calls a month on average.I ended up switching to a 1000 minute plan being that I tend to make more calls and only about 2gb of data rather than 4gb.

Reviews.Title: Not 10¢ minute anymore
Reviews.Author: Use The Force
Reviews.Content: I didn't purchase from this seller (you can get these anywhere for $30. Walgreens, grocery store, wherever...)But T-mobile only gives you 160 minutes for the $30 card. It used to be 10¢ a min no matter which refill card you used. Now you only get 10¢ min if you buy the $100 refill card.Guess I need to change companies again. That was the only reason I had kept T-mobile this long.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: it came a bit different then i was thinking about. it came with the code on a piece of paper, but it worked

Reviews.Title: It brings me a surprise.
Reviews.Author: Xia S.
Reviews.Content: I got to America  two weeks ago. The day after my arrival, I bought an activation kit, so I gained a phone number. But I must deposit money to my account to active the phone. I tried several times and methods, et al debit card, credit card. All of them failed.It is this refill card that give me a surprise. My phone works right now when I print the PIN in T-mobile website. Thank GOD. You know, it's so inconvenient not having a cell phone number.
